channel.title: Wallets on Bring Your Own Keys Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Wallets on Bring Your Own Keys Blog

item.title: Add your wallets
item.description: Add your wallet by ENS name, or Ethereum EVM address. The Wallet Name is used for display purposes only. The address is never stored on a centralized server. It stays in your browser’s localStorage, and gets sent to the data providers (e.g., Alchemy, Etherscan) when we request any blockchain data for the first time.
